Stixbox Function

NOM

    rt - Random numbers from the student t distributio

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

X = rt(n,d)

PARAMETRES

    • n : positive integer or a 2-vector [lig, col] of positive integers
    • d : positive integer (degree of freedom)
    • X : n-vector or a n-matrix of random numbers chosen from the student distribution with d degrees of freedom

DESCRIPTION

    Random numbers from the student t distribution (inversion method)
